name: Okra With Tomatoes And Oregano
keywords: okra, tomato, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 large tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large heavy skillet and add the onion and garlic. Cook over moderate heat, stirring, until the onion begins to turn golden brown (about 10 minutes). Add the tomatoes and oregano and cook for a further 10 minutes. Season to taste with salt, pepper and cinnamon.
Trim the cone tops off the okra without cutting into the pods. Add the okra to the onions and tomatoes and sauté until tender. Add lemon juice to taste, sprinkle with parsley and serve.
